thread.title: Trisha's Diwali wish
thread.title_full: Trisha's Diwali wish - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Trisha's Diwali wish
text:
Everyone knows that Trisha, who debuted in Sandalwood with Puneeth Rajkumar's Power ***, is an animal lover. The pretty actress has on many occassions done her bit for the betterment of animals and also regularly tweets about the need to be kind to out four-legged friends.
With Diwali fast approaching, animal lovers, includinh Trisha, are appealing to people to have a noise-free Diwali to keep animals safe. Trisha recently tweeted about this as well. Her tweet read, "Let's keep animals safe during Diwali too! Spread the word @PetaIndia #NoiseFreeDiwali." Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
